name: Wenhua Business Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is adequate, a typical US type city hotel in the middle of Guangzhou. But, hotel shows its age, walls and carpets... especially in hallways are aged, room is basic... but not new or ultra modern. I am sure there are newer, more plush hotels in the City. Internet access in room [pay a bit more for executive floors] and free beer and snacks in top floor executive lounge for happy hour. Value is there, at about $75/night.
reviews.title: Adequate But Not Super Modern or New
Staff that care!
reviews.text: While staying at the Beijing Central Plaza Holiday Inn I met the Loyalty Manager, Lois, of the Guangzhou City Center Holiday Inn. Lois was in Beijing to work with the Holiday Inn Central Plaza’s Loyalty Manager, Storm, for a week of exchanging ideas on how to provide excellent service their guests.

Even though I have not yet stayed at the hotel I am already planning a trip to Guangzhou because of my perception that the Guangzhou City Center Holiday Inn and Lois really care about every guest having a superior experience at their hotel. I was very impressed by Lois’s willingness to listen and gather ideas from Storm that she will take back to Guangzhou. I could also see that she had plenty of ideas of her own on how to provide quality service to her guests.
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text: Any hotel that is willing to invest in their staff by sending them to another hotel, that has a track record of providing excellent service, is a place that I want to stay. I give high marks to the Holiday Inns in China based on my stay in Beijing and the quality of the staff I met. People like Lois and Storm are a credit to their organization.
reviews.title: Great Staff

aka: Holiday Inn City Center Guangzhou Hotel
description: Strategically located along Huan Shi Dong in the city's commercial, shopping and entertainment district. Holiday Inn City Centre Guangzhou brings the high international standards of the world's most global hotel company to the thriving commercial center of Guangzhou. Being the city's first and truly international hotel, we offer the biggest rooms and beds and a level of personal care and attention that have made us a favourite choice for both business and leisure travellers. Just a 35 km drive from New Baiyun International Airport, 15 km from Guangzhou International Exhibition Centre, 7 km from Guangzhou East Railway Station and Trade Fair Centre, the hotel's prime location in the city centre, its health club, swimming pool and wide range of restaurants, lobby bar, banqueting facilities, and an ultra-modern cinema always ensure a convenient, comfortable and exciting stay. We are also only 5 minutes walk from the Friendship Store and major commercial buildings. An Executive Club and Business Centre offer a range of specially tailored services and amenities that allow you to do business in Guangzhou with efficiency and in comfort. In Guangzhou, we give you more reasons to choose Holiday Inn.
